name: Laura Crespo
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Hello,
 I am interested in applying. I have no prior work experience pertaining to this field but I am a quick learner with a positive can do attitude, fast on my feet, open minded,  and willing to do extensive research outside of work to acquire the necessary skills. Thank you for your consideration. I hope you have an amazing day!
experience: Cashier/customer service for the past 10 years trained to work front desk, snack bar and bar as needed
additionalInfo: I do not have my medical card but I will obtain one if required. I am familiar with the different strains, uses and their effects.
